entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
